UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.
The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Delta-Myrtoxin-Mp1a is a Helical Heterodimer from the Venom of the Jack Jumper Ant that has Antimicrobial, Membrane-Disrupting, and Nociceptive Activities
Literature.Author: Dekan Z, Headey SJ, Scanlon MJ, Baldo BA, Lee T-H, Aguilar M-I, Deuis JR, Vetter I, Elliott AG, Amado M, Cooper MA, Alewood D, Alewood PF

Literature.Title: It Takes Two: Dimerization Is Essential for the Broad-Spectrum Predatory and Defensive Activities of the Venom Peptide Mp1a from the Jack Jumper Ant Myrmecia pilosula
Literature.Author: Nixon SA, Dekan Z, Robinson SD, Guo S, Vetter I, Kotze AC, Alewood PF, King GF, Herzig V

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Killing=>15 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>15 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>9.6µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>9.6µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2146(MIC=>9.6µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>9.6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>9.6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa FADDI-PA070(MIC=>9.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>9.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 1(MIC=>9.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 17(MIC=>9.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus VRSA1(MIC=>9.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus VRSA10(MIC=>9.6µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 700677(MIC=>9.6µM),Haemonchus contortus(IC50=61.3±4.4µM),Drosophila melanogaster(LD50=>0.6µM)
